trans-unit.source: Manages design-time serialization to and from extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) for workflows.
trans-unit.target: 管理工作流程在設計階段與 eXtensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 之間進行的序列化。

trans-unit.source: A workflow or activity designer can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager> to access services useful to managing design-time serialization processes.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程或活動設計工具可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager>，存取有助於管理設計階段序列化程序的服務。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager> can be used to create objects, look up types, identify objects, and customize the serialization of particular types.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager> 可以用來建立物件、查詢型別、識別物件，以及自訂特定型別的序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的序列化提供者加入序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A> adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider%2A> 將自訂序列化提供者加入序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: Serialization providers can provide custom serializers for a particular type of object or set of types of objects.
trans-unit.target: 序列化提供者可以為特定的物件型別或物件型別集提供自訂的序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: During serialization, each custom serialization provider is queried to return a serializer for a specific data type, if it can provide one.
trans-unit.target: 進行序列化時，會查詢每個自訂序列化提供者，以傳回特定資料型別的序列化程式 (如果它能夠提供的話)。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager uses the custom serializer provided by this method before using the default serializer for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理員會先使用這個方法提供的自訂序列化程式，再使用特定型別的預設序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between serializers.
trans-unit.target: 取得以堆疊為基礎、使用者定義的儲存區，這個區域對於序列化程式之間的通訊很有用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack" /> that contains information about the current object being serialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack" />，包含要序列化之目前物件的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Some serializers require information about the context of an object to correctly persist their state.
trans-unit.target: 某些序列化程式會要求有關物件內容的資訊，以便正確保存 (Persist) 它們的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.Context%2A> enables a serializer to set data about the context of an object that it is serializing to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack> where another serializer can access it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.Context%2A> 可讓序列化程式設定物件內容的相關資料，以便將物件序列化為 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>，另一個序列化程式可以存取其中的物件內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for which to retrieve the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 為其擷取序列化程式的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the serializer to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之序列化程式的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serializer of the specified type for an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定之型別的物件傳回指定之型別的序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The requested serializer, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no appropriate serializer can be located.
trans-unit.target: 要求的序列化程式，如果找不到適合的序列化程式，則為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of service object to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之服務物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a service object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之型別的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: A service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬於 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 型別的服務物件，但是如果沒有任何屬於 <see langword="Nothing" /> 型別的服務物件，則為 null 參考 (Visual Basic 中為 <paramref name="serviceType" />)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> associated with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定之名稱相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully-qualified name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入之 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a type of the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之名稱的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> associated with <paramref name="typeName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 相關聯的 <paramref name="typeName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> of the type to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入之型別的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns that type associated with the specified XML qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定之 XML 限定名稱相關聯的型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> associated with <paramref name="xmlQualifiedName" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 相關聯的 <paramref name="xmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: An XML qualified name is a namespace-qualified local name, in the format of namespace:localname.
trans-unit.target: XML 限定名稱是命名空間限定的區域名稱，其格式為 namespace:localname。

trans-unit.source: Because prefixes are only required when XML is persisted or read, they are irrelevant for <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> objects.
trans-unit.target: 因為只有在保存 (Persist) 或讀取 XML 時才需要前置詞，因此它們與 <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> 物件無關。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the user to ensure the local name does not contain a ":"
trans-unit.target: 使用者要負責確定區域名稱不包含 ":"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="xmlQualifiedName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xmlQualifiedName" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for which to return the XML-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回 XML 限定名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the XML prefix for the qualified name or an empty string if no prefix is defined.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，便會包含限定名稱的 XML 前置詞或空字串 (如果未定義前置詞)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML-qualified name associated with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定之型別相關聯的 XML 限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> associated with <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> 相關聯的 <paramref name="type" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly that is associated with the current serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與目前序列化程式相關聯的組件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that is associated with the current serializer.
trans-unit.target: 與目前序列化程式相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: This provider must be added using <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider)" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個提供者必須使用 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider)" /> 加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes a custom serialization provider from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 將自訂的序列化提供者從 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager" /> 移除。

trans-unit.source: The error to report.
trans-unit.target: 要報告的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Reports an error in serialization.
trans-unit.target: 報告序列化中的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: `errorInformation` can be of any object type.
trans-unit.target: `errorInformation` 可以為任何物件型別。

trans-unit.source: If it is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果是例外狀況，則會擷取該例外狀況的訊息，並向使用者報告。

trans-unit.source: If it is any other type, <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> is called to display the information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果是任何其他型別，則會呼叫 <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>，以便向使用者顯示資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the serialization manager to use with the current serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以與目前序列化程式搭配使用的序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use with the current serializer.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前序列化程式搭配使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the arguments for <c>type</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 包含 <c>type</c> 的引數。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This name can be used to access the object later using <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System#ComponentModel#Design#Serialization#IDesignerSerializationManager#GetInstance(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 之後便可使用 <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System#ComponentModel#Design#Serialization#IDesignerSerializationManager#GetInstance(System.String)" /> 以這個名稱來存取物件。

trans-unit.source: If a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) is passed, the object is still created but cannot be accessed by name.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳遞的是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，物件還是可以建立，但是無法以名稱存取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the object to the design container; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要將物件加入設計容器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type and adds it to a collection of named instances.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定型別的執行個體，並將它加入具名執行個體的集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created object.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `addToContainer` is set to `true`, the object must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `addToContainer` 設定為 `true`，則物件必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>，才能發生效用。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 所要擷取的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of a created object of the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定名稱之已建立物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the object with the given name, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no object by that name can be found.
trans-unit.target: 有指定名稱之物件的執行個體，如果找不到有該名稱的物件，則為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: `name` must be set through a prior call to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerSerializationManager%23CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Collections.ICollection,System.String,System.Boolean)?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須藉由先前對 `name` 的呼叫，才能完成 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerSerializationManager%23CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Collections.ICollection,System.String,System.Boolean)?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的設定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> for which to retrieve the name.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取其名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the object is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 物件的名稱，如果物件未命名，則為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of properties that can be serialized with available serializers.
trans-unit.target: 取得可以透過可用的序列化程式序列化的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> that contains the properties to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" />，包含要序列化的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property can contain an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以包含空的集合。

trans-unit.source: A serializer should never assume that any properties exist.
trans-unit.target: 序列化程式不應假設有任何屬性存在。

trans-unit.source: The object to name.
trans-unit.target: 待命名的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name to assign to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the specified existing object.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的現有物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerSerializationManager%23SetName(System.Object,System.String)> is useful when you need to create and then name an instance of an object without using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerSerializationManager%23CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Collections.ICollection,System.String,System.Boolean)?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要在不使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerSerializationManager%23SetName(System.Object,System.String)> 的情況下建立並命名物件的執行個體時，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerSerializationManager%23CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Collections.ICollection,System.String,System.Boolean)?displayProperty=nameWithType> 便可以派上用場。
